## FieldDropdown class

Class for an editable dropdown field.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class FieldDropdown extends Field<string> 
```
**Extends:** [Field](./blockly.field.md)<!-- -->&lt;string&gt;

|  [IMAGE\_Y\_OFFSET](./blockly.fielddropdown.image_y_offset.md) | <p><code>protected</code></p><p><code>static</code></p> | number | The y offset from the top of the field to the top of the image, if an image is selected. |

|  [SERIALIZABLE](./blockly.fielddropdown.serializable.md) |  | boolean | Serializable fields are saved by the serializer, non-serializable fields are not. Editable fields should also be serializable. |

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [applyColour()](./blockly.fielddropdown.applycolour.md) |  | Updates the dropdown arrow to match the colour/style of the block. |

|  [doValueUpdate\_(newValue)](./blockly.fielddropdown.dovalueupdate_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Update the value of this dropdown field. |
|  [dropdownDispose\_()](./blockly.fielddropdown.dropdowndispose_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Disposes of events and DOM-references belonging to the dropdown editor. |
|  [getOptions(useCache)](./blockly.fielddropdown.getoptions.md) |  | Return a list of the options for this dropdown. |
|  [getText\_()](./blockly.fielddropdown.gettext_.md) | <code>protected</code> | <p>Use the <code>getText_</code> developer hook to override the field's text representation. Get the selected option text. If the selected option is an image we return the image alt text. If the selected option is an HTMLElement, return the title, ariaLabel, or innerText of the element.</p><p>If you use HTMLElement options in Node.js and call this function, ensure that you are supplying an implementation of HTMLElement, such as through jsdom-global.</p> |
|  [initView()](./blockly.fielddropdown.initview.md) |  | Create the block UI for this dropdown. |
|  [isOptionListDynamic()](./blockly.fielddropdown.isoptionlistdynamic.md) |  |  |
|  [onItemSelected\_(menu, menuItem)](./blockly.fielddropdown.onitemselected_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Handle the selection of an item in the dropdown menu. |
|  [render\_()](./blockly.fielddropdown.render_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Draws the border with the correct width. |
|  [setOptions(menuGenerator)](./blockly.fielddropdown.setoptions.md) |  | Update the options on this dropdown. This will reset the selected item to the first item in the list. |
|  [shouldAddBorderRect\_()](./blockly.fielddropdown.shouldaddborderrect_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Whether or not the dropdown should add a border rect. |
|  [showEditor\_(e)](./blockly.fielddropdown.showeditor_.md) | <code>protected</code> | Create a dropdown menu under the text. |
|  [trimOptions(options)](./blockly.fielddropdown.trimoptions.md) | <code>protected</code> | Factor out common words in statically defined options. Create prefix and/or suffix labels. |
|  [validateOptions(options)](./blockly.fielddropdown.validateoptions.md) | <code>protected</code> | Validates the data structure to be processed as an options list. |
